roleset.name: diverge from what is expected
roleset.note: ABERRATE-V, ABBERATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: aberrate-v
example.text: "Ymirites do not aberrate in such fashion," said Thua stiffly.

example.name: aberrate-v
example.text: Few words have aberrated from their primaries less than this

example.name: aberration-n
example.text: This apparent ellipse of motion of the star is called the aberration of starlight.
